nodes.text: Goddess missiles were used by Jaina Solo during the Yuuzhan Vong War. Goddess missiles were fired from a starfighter into a Yuuzhan Vong coralskipper. When in place, the missile would give off the gravitic signature of Trickster, a Yuuzhan Vong frigate stolen by Jaina Solo, The Yuuzhan Vong, who were obsessed with capturing Jaina, would thus follow their own ships, and be led into traps. The Goddess missiles had the symbol of Yun-Harla on them, this was to provoke and annoy the Yuuzhan Vong. Voort saBinring later commented on the Goddess missiles, telling Jaina ways in which they could have been improved.
